testcase.name: ApplicationController .create() should create a book in the database
ApplicationController .create() should return BadRequest if request body is of wrong format
ApplicationController .read(id: String) should find a book in the database by id
ApplicationController .read(id: String) should return a BadRequest if a book of the ID is not found
ApplicationController .update(id: String, newData: DataModel) should find a book in the database by it's ID and replace it with the new book

testcase.name: ApplicationController .update(id: String, newData: DataModel) should return NotFound message if wrong ID
ApplicationController .update(id: String, newData: DataModel) should return Bad_Request if incorrect Json body
ApplicationController .delete(id: String) should find a book in the database by id and delete it
ApplicationController .delete(id: String) should return a Bad Request if the id does not exist
